items.title: Ultimate Guide to Drone Applications-Construction Industry-1
items.headline: Master all the techniques and software to use drone data and enhance productivity in each stage of Construction!
objectives_summary: Understand the entire construction lifecycle
Understand how the drone data outputs can be used for the first 5 stages in the construction life cycle
Use drones to make site purchase decisions

items.title: Balanced Scorecard: Master Your Data Driven Performance
items.headline: Simplify Your Business Strategy and Increase Your Performance Using This Data Driven Tool
objectives_summary: Define a Balanced Scorecard
Build a good strategy map
Craft winning Key Performance Indicators (KPI's)

items.title: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Exam Practice Test
items.headline: IASSC Lean six sigma green belt certification exam practice test (500 Questions for practice + 6 Reference books on LSS)
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will get full confidence to pass the IASSC Certified Lean six sigma Green belt exam at first attempt with at least 80% marks.
Total 500 questions for practice with detail explainations for answers and these questions will prepare you for Green belt exams like IASSC, ASQ etc.
24/7 support for any doubts related to IASSC Green belt exam.

items.title: Inventory Management by LEAN in Supply Chain Management

visible_instructors.name: Adarsh
visible_instructors.title: Adarsh Amal
visible_instructors.job_title: Masters in Shipping, Logistics & Supply Chain Management.

items.headline: Lean Inventory Management, Inventory Control in Supply Chain Management , Manufacturing, Warehouse Logistics Management
objectives_summary: Supply Chain tricks to enhance the utilization to inventory to optimum level with LEAN SIX SIGMA TOOLS
Learning the tools with practical and day to day life examples to help you remember every technique.
An MBA style course perfect for managers, executives, business analysts.

items.title: Statistical Quality Control (SQC)
items.headline: Complete guide on devising and implementing acceptance sampling procedures based on ISO 2859 and 3952 standards
objectives_summary: Provide thorough understanding on purpose and function of Statistical Quality Control.
Enable a learner to device suitable and effective inspection and sampling plans in respective organizations.
Learn and impalement international quality control standards such as ISO 2859 and 3951.

items.title: Churn, CLV, MRR, CAC, NPS... - 20 SaaS metrics you must know
items.headline: Master the most common Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) of the SaaS industry
objectives_summary: Learn the 10 most important SaaS metrics: MRR, ARR, Churn, CAC, ARPU, CLV, LTV, NPS, CSAT, CES
Talk confident about these Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
Highlight these metrics in your next department report and impress your manager

items.title: Procurement Powerhouse: The beginner’s guide
items.headline: Bootstrap your career in the exciting World of Procurement
objectives_summary: Understand the Importance and positioning of Procurement in an organization
Learn about the Practices and processes involved in driving compliant procurement in the organization
Familiarize with all the components of Procurement and Sourcing across Manufacturing, Projects and Service sectors

items.title: Time Management Mastery - Boost Productivity and Save Time
items.headline: Effective time management strategies
objectives_summary: Create a time management stategy
Boost productivity
Alleviate time pressures

items.title: Customer Service Fundamentals
items.headline: An introduction to customer service and its importance in any business.
objectives_summary: To appreciate the true value of positive customer service at every level of an industry
To understand the rules of great customer servicess
To deliver outstanding customer service

items.title: Medical Device Process Validation. ISO 13485. IQ OQ PQ.
items.headline: Validate a process to gain approval to sell medical devices in the EU, U.S. & Internationally. Compliance to ISO 13485.
objectives_summary: Understand what Process Validation means for any industry.
The course will focus on validation for the life science industry especially the medical device industry.
Understand why we need process validation.

items.title: Reverse Logistics Management and Sustainability
items.headline: Learn the Best Practices to Managing Returns and Achieving Social, Economic, and Environmental Responsibility
objectives_summary: You will be able to develop, implement, and manage effective and sustainable returns operations, reduce costs, and create value for your company and customers
You will understand how to plan and control the efficient and effective reverse flow of materials, in process inventory, finished goods, and related information
You will have gained the knowledge to develop and implement a sustainability development system in your company and produce long-term global well-being

items.headline: Certified Quality Process Analyst (CQPA) Exam Preparation Course - Confidently Pass the Exam in the First Attempt
objectives_summary: Successfully pass the Certified Quality Process Analyst (CQPA) in the first attempt. The course is fully aligned with the latest version of the Body of Knowledge.
Confidently implement the proven quality management and quality engineering principles in your work areas.
Build a strong foundation for  your successful Quality Management career

items.title: Design of Experiments for Product, Process & Quality Manager
items.headline: Factorial Designs | Fractional Factorial Designs | Taguchi Designs - Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Level
objectives_summary: Types & Phases of Structured Experiments (Design of Experiments)
Terms in DoE such as Factors, Levels, Runs, Blocks, Center Points, Repetitions, Replications, etc
Plan, Set up, Perform, Analyze and Interpret the results of DOEs

items.title: Process Mapping: Learn The Basics Of Mapping A Process
items.headline: Making the process map work to reduce the risk of knowledge loss and increase compliance.

understand process mapping conventions
understand tools to use, either purpose driven, or using office suite

items.title: GMail, IFTTT, Virtual Assistant - Ultimate Productivity Trio
